channel.title: How do you link a source with a client?
channel.description:
Before you call me an idiot, I'm pretty new to server making, so give me a break : p
So anyway, i now have my source fully functional and i downloaded some dogey client which i can log onto and play as normal.
But how do I allow other people to play my server with a client? I'm pretty quick to catch on to new things so rather than call me an idiot just try and help (:
EDIT- I noticed when i log in it quickly says "connecting to 127.0.0.1" do i somehow have to change that to almostscape.no-ip.info for people to join? assuming they also have the client.
EDIT2- Ok i found the spot i think.. in client.java where it had 127.0.0.1 and i changed it to almostscape.no-ip.info. So is that correct? is that what I'm meant to do?
oh and also, when i run the client it still says the old name up the top, like... on the blue window bar (transparent for vista) and it says "X-Client" i want it to say "Almost-Scape Client" how do i change that?

item.title: How do you link a source with a client?
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

client.java, ctrl+f, 127.0.0.1, almostscape.no-ip.info, save, compile.

To link your server and client, try this tutorial out: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402053.0.html
